titleStmt.title: Robert Hervey to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7969

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
LEGAL DEPARTMENT
Galena & Chicago Union Rail Road Co.
77 Dearborn Street
Chicago, 21. May 1863
Sir,

I held a Commission from the Government of Kentucky to take acknowledgements of deeds &c dated 13 Jany 1834. It has of course long since expired by lapse of time. I am desirous of having a new one. Will you be good enough to let me know the fee & I will remit it.
Refer to Hon B. S. Morris of this City. & to Saml B. Thomas Esq of Elizabethtown Kentucky.

Very Respectfully
Your obt st.
Robt Hervey

To Hon
The Secretary of State
Frankfort
Kentucky

Illinois
Comr of Deeds
Robt Hervey
Chicago
Appd May 30. 1863.
